name: World of Warships
description: World of Warships Europe version Public Test Server with DXVK
notes: - Don't start the game until the installer is finished

task.description: Installing World of Warships PTS. This could take a while...
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- game:
    filename: WoWS_PublicTest.exe
    url: http://dl-wows-gc.wargaming.net/projects/PT/ru/files/oiu8123haqw/WoWS_PublicTest.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Games/World_of_Warships-PTS/WoWSLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: nocrashdialog
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing World of Warships PTS. This could take a while...
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win10
    arch: win64
    description: Setting Wine to Windows 10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
  pulse_latency: false
wine:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
